review: the fire TV stick is ok, but I have to order the movies.  I thought the movies came with it. Its a waste of money when you have cable.
author: Delois Harris-Johnson

review: It was a little difficult to put into the TV since it is mounted on the wall but so far we have loved it.
author: Marla Wilen

review: I'm very happy with it! Easy to navigate and so many choices!
author: Annie Lee

review: It's working a lot faster than my old system...I like the HD graphics...The remote control is a bit too small and very slippery , but that's just a small issue.
author: Ross

review: Couldn't be happier!  Easiest set up, access to so much!  Definitely recommend and wish I would've purchased sooner!
author: Amy Trotch

review: Very easy to set up and use! I would definitely recommend purchasing it for at TV that had HD MI port
author: Richard J Rappa
